Reviews.Title: Stay Away!
Reviews.Author: Dino "D" "Dino"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these on another website for a fraction of what they're trying to get for them here and they're still not worth it. Some the wi-fi doesn't work coming right out of the box and when it does work it goes down often even with the router 2 feet away. Even if they're hardwired they still fall short as the video is constantly black and white unless there is an enormous amount of light in the area. Lorex cameras are a better buy if you can get them on sale.

Reviews.Title: Not ready for primetime
Reviews.Author: A. LLC "Stylusshop"
Reviews.Content: After doing a lot of research, I purchased these 2 cameras and have to say that I was thoroughly dissapointed. To this day I am unable to view the cameras remotely. I am able to see them while on the office LAN but once I hit them from an internet IP I cannot connect. It is worthy to note that our setup has these cameras on actual internet IP addresses and that they are NOT behind a firewall. They should work just fine but they don't. Also I was under the impression that they supported FTP uploads (as stated on the manufacturers website) but this is not the case. After talking to the manufacturer I was told that they would release a firmware upgrade at some point in the future but they could not give me an ETA...I would suggest purchasing something else. This is not getting it done...
